__e: Gentlemen, could you spare a moment.
If I may, I'd like to say how deeply sorry I am--
I have no intention of dying now, but if I'm going to, allow me to choose where and how.
If you will allow me, I will call your carriage for you.
- Just how old are you? - What?
If you'll excuse me for saying it, you need him too.
If I may, I'd like to say how deeply sorry I am--
Would you allow me to speak as I would have in the old days?
But you'll certainly believe these names if you'll permit me to show them to you.
We know your methods of questioning people.
But I hope you'll permit me to ask just a few more.
They fell all over themselves giving me permission to see you, and alone.
